statusLine.command: input=$(cat); printf "\033[1;32m➜\033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m" "$(basename "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')")"; if git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" rev-parse --git-dir >/dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || echo 'HEAD'); if git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" diff --quiet 2>/dev/null && git -C "$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir')" diff --cached --quiet 2>/dev/null; then printf " \033[1;34mgit:(\033[31m%s\033[1;34m)\033[0m" "$branch"; else printf " \033[1;34mgit:(\033[31m%s\033[1;34m) \033[33m✗\033[0m" "$branch"; fi; fi
